intro: Fordia ngii, commonly known as the golden flame tree, is a small evergreen shrub native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rhamnaceae and is characterized by its showy, bright yellow flowers that bloom in clusters during the summer months. Fordia ngii is relatively low-maintenance and adaptable to various soil types.
